text.name: Blinkstep
text.desc:
[WhenUse] If target has <style="highlight">4+ [Burst], Coin Power +1
<style="highlight">[WinDuel] Inflict +1 [Burst] Count
coinDescs: <style="highlight">[OnSucceedAttack] At 10+ Speed, Reuse Coin once (once per Skill)

text.name: Blinkstep
text.desc:

[WinDuel] Inflict +1 [Burst] Count
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] At 10+ Speed, Reuse Coin once (once per Skill)<style="highlight">

text.name: Clearing the Path, My Lord.
text.desc:
[WhenUse] If target has 4+ [Burst], Coin Power +1
[WinDuel] Inflict +1 [Burst] Count
coinDescs: If target has [BurstAgility] or [BurstZilu], deal +30% damage

text.name: Clearing the Path, My Lord.

<style="highlight">[WhenUse] Gain 2 [Agility] next turn (once per turn)
[WinDuel] Inflict +1 [Burst] Count
coinDescs: If target has [BurstAgility] or [BurstZilu], deal +30% damage<style="highlight">

text.name: Clearing the Path, My Lord.
text.desc:
<style="highlight">If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's, deal +(Speed difference x [EnhanceZilu] on self)% damage (max 50%)
<style="highlight">If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's by 3 or more, Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] If target has 4+ [Burst], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Gain 2 [Agility] next turn (once per turn)
[WinDuel] Inflict +1 [Burst] Count
coinDescs: If target has [BurstAgility] or [BurstZilu], deal <style="highlight">+50% damage

text.name: Traceless to Sight and Sound Alike.
text.desc:
If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's, deal +(Speed difference x [Burst] Potency on target)% damage (max 50%)
If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's by 2 or more, Coin Power +1
[StartBattle] Gain 1 [SupportProtect] (once per turn)
[BeforeUse] At 10+ [EnhanceZilu], activate 'Ascendant Heishou - Mao Technique: Cloudsplitting Manifestation' instead
[WhenUse] Gain 3 [LegStrength]
[WinDuel] Inflict +2 [Burst]
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] At 10+ Speed, Reuse Coin once (once per Skill)

text.name: Traceless to Sight and Sound Alike.
text.desc:
If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's, deal +(Speed difference x [Burst] Potency on target)% damage (max 50%)
<style="highlight">If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's, gain Coin Power based on Speed difference (Coin Power +1 for every 2 Speed difference; max 2)
[StartBattle] Gain 1 [SupportProtect] (once per turn)
[BeforeUse] At 10+ [EnhanceZilu], activate 'Ascendant Heishou - Mao Technique: Cloudsplitting Manifestation' instead
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] If target has 15+ [Burst], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Gain 3 [LegStrength]
[WinDuel] Inflict +2 [Burst] Count
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] At 10+ Speed, Reuse Coin once (once per Skill)<style="highlight">

text.name: Ascendant Heishou - Mao Technique: Cloudsplitting Manifestation
text.desc:
If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's, deal +(Speed difference x [Burst] Potency on target)% damage (max 50%)
If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's by 2 or more, Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] If target has 15+ [Burst], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] At 10+ Speed, gain 20 [Breath]; if this unit has less than 4 [Breath] Count, raise [Breath] Count up to 4
[WhenUse] Gain 3 [LegStrength]
[WinDuel] Inflict +2 [Burst] Count
[EndSkill] Consume 10 [EnhanceZilu]
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] At 10+ Speed, Reuse Coin once (once per Skill)

text.name: Ascendant Heishou - Mao Technique: Cloudsplitting Manifestation
text.desc:
If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's, deal +(Speed difference x [Burst] Potency on target)% damage (max 50%)
<style="highlight">If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's, gain Coin Power based on Speed difference (Coin Power +1 for every 2 Speed difference; max 2)
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 10 [Burst] on target (max 2)
[WhenUse] At 10+ Speed, gain 20 [Breath]; if this unit has less than 4 [Breath] Count, raise [Breath] Count up to 4

[WinDuel] Inflict +2 [Burst] Count
[EndSkill] Consume 10 [EnhanceZilu]
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] At 10+ Speed, Reuse Coin once (once per Skill)<style="highlight">

1021201.name: Heishou Mutation [Mao] / Mao Branch Adept
1021201.desc:
If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's, deal +2% more damage for every 1 Speed difference (max 10%)

Gain 1 [EnhanceZilu] every time an ally triggers a Deathrite effect (5 times per turn)
- If this unit triggered a Deathrite effect, gain 1 additional [EnhanceZilu]
When activating the [SupportProtect] effect, gain 5 [EnhanceZilu]

1021203.name: Tianjiu Star
1021203.desc: When [BurstZilu] Stack drops to 0 and expires, gain [BurstVulnerableZilu]

1021221.name: Blinkblade
1021221.desc: When 1 ally with the fastest Speed inflicts [Burst] damage, gain 1 [AttackUp] next turn (3 times per turn)
